lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic hopes Nick Kyrgios can learn some "life lessons" after the Australian was fined by the ATP Tour for breaching its code of conduct during a contentious defeat at the Shanghai Masters.
snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic hopes Nick Kyrgios can learn some "life lessons" after the Australian was fined by the ATP Tour for breaching its code of conduct during a contentious defeat at the Shanghai Masters....

headline.main: Djokovic Hoping Kyrgios Can Stop Squandering His Gifts
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Hoping Kyrgios Can Stop Squandering His Gifts
